about_the_game:
Riho Futaba (voiced by Yuko Goto),
a virtual idol who has appeared in numerous video games including the "Dream Club" series,
is joining the EDF, appearing in her Original Blue Swimsuit.
She also comes equipped with an exclusive weapon available only with this content.
detailed_description:
Riho Futaba (voiced by Yuko Goto),
a virtual idol who has appeared in numerous video games including the "Dream Club" series,
is joining the EDF, appearing in her Original Blue Swimsuit.
She also comes equipped with an exclusive weapon available only with this content.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8.1 64bit Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-3225 3.3 GHz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT630
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 sound device
  • Additional Notes: XInput Controller
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8.1 64bit Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4770
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050 Ti / Radeon R9 280 3GB
  • DirectX: Version 11

  • Additional Notes: XInput Controller
